title: Conduct a Pre-Shift Safety Briefing
description: A shift supervisor must conduct a daily safety briefing (toolbox talk) with their stevedoring gang before work begins.

tasks.description: Review any safety alerts or incidents from the past 24 hours.
tasks.expected_outcome: Supervisor checks the safety system for any new alerts or lessons learned.

tasks.description: Prepare a short talk covering a specific safety topic (e.g., proper use of PPE, awareness of moving vehicles).
tasks.expected_outcome: Supervisor prepares notes for the day's topic.

tasks.description: Gather the crew, deliver the briefing, and have all attendees sign a log sheet.
tasks.expected_outcome: The briefing is completed, and attendance is documented for compliance records.
